description:
During health examinations at school, Mechazawa receives some troubling news. Afterwards, the Cromartie boys throw a birthday party at Maeda`s place, but not for Maeda.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment une visite médicale eut quelques conséquences pour Mechazawa
Electric Warrior / HAPPY BIRTHDAY 2 / キラークイーン
